body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.28 is now available.

What's new in this release:
GnuTLS used for all secure connections, OpenSSL is no longer needed.
Mac driver enabled by default.
Built-in FixedSys fonts.
New icon for the joystick control panel.
Postscript driver improvements.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
